Reviews.Title: Great buy, reasonable price!
Reviews.Author: MEGirl
Reviews.Content: My son really loves his new laptop. Came loaded with windows 8. Performs well. He's already used up all of his hard drive space gaming, but that's what deleting old games fixes - fault of child, not of laptop. The keyboard has slightly raised contoured keys which look and feel more like a traditional keyboard which I love. The price was reasonable and has worked well for his school work too.

ProductInfo.Features:
AMD A6-4400M 2.7GHz Accelerated Processor, AMD Radeon HD 7520G Discrete-Class graphics and up to 2036MB total graphics memory, Genuine Windows 8
15.6-inch diagonal HD BrightView LED-backlit display (1366x768, Altec Lansing dual speakers with Dolby Advanced Audio
4GB DDR3 SDRAM (1 DIMM), Multi-Format Digital Media Card Reader for Secure Digital cards & Multimedia cards
320GB 5400RPM hard drive, SuperMulti DVD burner
HP TrueVision HD Webcam with integrated dual array digital microphone, HDMI, 2 SuperSpeed USB 3.0
ProductInfo.Name: HP Pavilion g6-2228nr 15.6 inch Laptop AMD A6 4400M 2.7GHz Processor, 4GB Ram, 320GB Hard Drive, Windows 8
